QuestData.Title: Legion: The Legion Returns
QuestData.Description:
Warriors of da Horde! Break out ya axes and sharpen ya spears. Da Burning Legion has returned ta our world!
We be shipping outta Bladefist Bay right away. With da full fury of da Horde, we gonna smash der line so hard dat Sargeras is gonna feel it in da Nether!
Get to da ships. We got demons ta slay!
QuestData.LogDescription: Check in with Holgar Stormaxe at the Dranosh'ar Blockade.
